Function Documentation

int qsort_inters ( const void *  e1,
const void *  e2 
)

It sorts two connections by the source neuron and the delay.

This functions sorts two connections by the source neuron and the delay.

Parameters:
e1 The firs connection.
e2 The second connection.
Returns:
0 if the two connections have the same index of the source neuron and the same delay. <0 if the second connection have a higher index of the source neuron or the same index and lower delay. >0 if the first connection have a higher index of the source neuron or the same index and lower delay.
